deckInfo.name: Chinese - The Other Shore - Chorus v1
deckInfo.description: Covers Level 1 (characters & small words), Level 2 (phrases) for the Chorus of The Other Shore.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 一阵风 (yīzhènfēng) - a gust of wind
conceptGroups.description: Characters 一 (yī), 阵 (zhèn), 风 (fēng) and the combined phrase.

vocabulary.name: yi1zhen4feng1
vocabulary.explanation: 一 (yī) - one + 阵 (zhèn) - spell/burst + 风 (fēng) - wind = a gust of wind.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 抖落 (dǒuluò) - to fall, to shake off
conceptGroups.description: Characters 抖 (dǒu), 落 (luò) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: dou3luo4
vocabulary.explanation: 抖 (dǒu) - to shake + 落 (luò) - to fall = to fall, to shake off.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 水月 (shuǐyuè) - water moon (reflection)
conceptGroups.description: Characters 水 (shuǐ), 月 (yuè) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: shui3yue4
vocabulary.englishText: water moon, moon reflection in water
vocabulary.explanation: 水 (shuǐ) - water + 月 (yuè) - moon = water moon, moon reflection in water.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 躲藏 (duǒcáng) - to hide
conceptGroups.description: Characters 躲 (duǒ), 藏 (cáng) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: duo3cang2
vocabulary.explanation: 躲 (duǒ) - to hide/avoid + 藏 (cáng) - to hide/store = to hide.

conceptGroups.description: Characters 回 (huí), 忆 (yì) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: hui2yi4
vocabulary.explanation: 回 (huí) - to return/go back + 忆 (yì) - to remember = memory, to recall.

conceptGroups.description: Characters 不 (bù), 愿 (yuàn) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: bu4yuan4
vocabulary.explanation: 不 (bù) - not + 愿 (yuàn) - to wish/be willing = unwilling, not willing.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 先走 (xiānzǒu) - to leave first
conceptGroups.description: Characters 先 (xiān), 走 (zǒu) and the combined phrase.

vocabulary.name: zou3
vocabulary.englishText: to walk, to go, to leave

vocabulary.name: xian1zou3
vocabulary.englishText: to leave first, to go first
vocabulary.explanation: 先 (xiān) - first/before + 走 (zǒu) - to walk/go/leave = to leave first, to go first.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 一个梦 (yīgèmèng) - a dream
conceptGroups.description: Characters 一 (yī), 个 (gè), 梦 (mèng) and the combined phrase.

vocabulary.name: yi1ge4meng4
vocabulary.explanation: 一 (yī) - one + 个 (gè) - measure word + 梦 (mèng) - dream = a dream.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 夜色 (yèsè) - night scene
conceptGroups.description: Characters 夜 (yè), 色 (sè) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: ye4se4
vocabulary.explanation: 夜 (yè) - night + 色 (sè) - color/scene = night scene, nightfall.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 朦胧 (ménglóng) - dim, hazy
conceptGroups.description: Characters 朦 (méng), 胧 (lóng) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: meng2long2
vocabulary.explanation: 朦 (méng) - dim/hazy + 胧 (lóng) - hazy/misty = dim, hazy, misty.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 苏醒 (sūxǐng) - to wake up
conceptGroups.description: Characters 苏 (sū), 醒 (xǐng) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: xing3
vocabulary.englishText: to wake up, to be awake

vocabulary.name: su1xing3
vocabulary.englishText: to wake up, to regain consciousness
vocabulary.explanation: 苏 (sū) - to revive/come to + 醒 (xǐng) - to wake up = to wake up, to regain consciousness.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 有始有终 (yǒushǐyǒuzhōng) - from beginning to end
conceptGroups.description: Characters and the combined phrase meaning 'from beginning to end'.

vocabulary.name: you3shi3you3zhong1
vocabulary.englishText: from beginning to end, to see something through
vocabulary.explanation: 有 (yǒu) - to have + 始 (shǐ) - beginning + 有 (yǒu) - to have + 终 (zhōng) - end = from beginning to end, to see something through.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 多少次 (duōshǎocì) - how many times
conceptGroups.description: Characters 多少 (duōshǎo), 次 (cì) and the combined phrase.

vocabulary.name: duo1shao3
vocabulary.explanation: 多 (duō) - many/much + 少 (shǎo) - few/little = how much, how many.

vocabulary.name: duo1shao3ci4
vocabulary.explanation: 多少 (duōshǎo) - how many + 次 (cì) - times = how many times.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 擦肩 (cājiān) - to brush shoulders
conceptGroups.description: Characters 擦 (cā), 肩 (jiān) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: ca1jian1
vocabulary.englishText: to brush shoulders, to pass by
vocabulary.explanation: 擦 (cā) - to rub/brush + 肩 (jiān) - shoulder = to brush shoulders, to pass by.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Building 回眸 (huímóu) - to look back
conceptGroups.description: Characters 回 (huí), 眸 (móu) and the combined word.

vocabulary.name: hui2mou2
vocabulary.englishText: to look back, to glance back
vocabulary.explanation: 回 (huí) - to return/go back + 眸 (móu) - pupil/gaze = to look back, to glance back.

conceptGroups.groupName: L1: Other Core Vocabulary from Chorus
conceptGroups.description: Introducing other essential characters from the chorus.

vocabulary.name: zhi1qian2
vocabulary.explanation: 之 (zhī) - (possessive particle) + 前 (qián) - front/before = before, prior to.

conceptGroups.description: Reviewing key phrases from the chorus.

vocabulary.name: jian3_yi1zhen4feng1
vocabulary.explanation: '剪 (jiǎn)' - to cut/slice; '一阵风 (yīzhènfēng)' - a gust of wind.

vocabulary.name: dou3luo4_zai4_shui3yue4zhong1
vocabulary.englishText: falls into the water reflected moon
vocabulary.explanation: '抖落 (dǒuluò)' - to fall/shake off; '在 (zài)' - in; '水月中 (shuǐyuèzhōng)' - in the water moon.

vocabulary.name: shei2_duo3cang2zai4
vocabulary.explanation: '谁 (shéi)' - who; '躲藏 (duǒcáng)' - to hide; '在 (zài)' - in/within.

vocabulary.name: hui2yi4zhong1_bu4yuan4_xian1zou3
vocabulary.englishText: within memories, unwilling to leave first
vocabulary.explanation: '回忆中 (huíyìzhōng)' - within memories; '不愿 (bùyuàn)' - unwilling; '先走 (xiānzǒu)' - to leave first.

vocabulary.name: jian3_yi1ge4meng4
vocabulary.explanation: '捡 (jiǎn)' - to pick up/pocket; '一个梦 (yīgèmèng)' - a dream.

vocabulary.name: chen4_ye4se4_zheng4_meng2long2
vocabulary.englishText: while the night is still dimmed
vocabulary.explanation: '趁 (chèn)' - while/taking advantage of; '夜色 (yèsè)' - night scene; '正 (zhèng)' - just/exactly; '朦胧 (ménglóng)' - dim/hazy.

vocabulary.name: zai4_ta1_su1xing3_zhi1qian2
vocabulary.explanation: '在 (zài)' - at/before; '他 (tā)' - he; '苏醒 (sūxǐng)' - to wake up; '之前 (zhīqián)' - before.

vocabulary.name: you3shi3_you3zhong1
vocabulary.explanation: '有始有终 (yǒushǐyǒuzhōng)' - from beginning to end, to see something through.

vocabulary.name: duo1shao3ci4_ca1jian1
vocabulary.englishText: how many times does one rub shoulders
vocabulary.explanation: '多少次 (duōshǎocì)' - how many times; '擦肩 (cājiān)' - to brush shoulders/pass by.

vocabulary.name: cai2neng2_huan4_yi1ci4_hui2mou2
vocabulary.explanation: '才能 (cáinéng)' - only then can; '换 (huàn)' - to exchange; '一次 (yīcì)' - one time; '回眸 (huímóu)' - to look back.
